review: If you're looking for a creative and exciting shooter, then this game is for you. Just remember to say 'Pass the Whisky' in a western accent every 10 seconds during the game. I guarantee you'll win every time.
You can make yourself a flying speedy handsome purple fabulous fancy beautiful Maxwell.Best game ever 10/10

Although this is the latest in goat simulation technolegy, if you are looking for a realistic adrenaline-pumping goat simulator you've come to the wrong place. However if you are looking for a light-hearted, fun, unrealistly awesome goat simulator then this is probebly worth the ten bucks you normally have to cough up to get it.
